home.description: Your platform for accessibility and communication. Empowering individuals to connect and thrive with innovative tools designed for inclusivity.
home.voiceNavigation: Looking for help? Use the voice button to navigate the platform.

about.title: About EcoVoz
about.description: EcoVoz is an innovative initiative created by Team 12 during the Hackathon Autism Tech 2024. Our goal is to provide a technological solution that enables people with speech or language disabilities to communicate effectively and inclusively, using artificial intelligence and assistive technology.
about.feature1: Advanced voice recognition for people with speech disabilities.
about.feature3: Integration with assistive devices for alternative communication.
about.feature5: Voice database for training and continuous improvement.
about.mission: Our mission is to promote inclusion, increase independence, and improve the quality of life for people with speech disabilities by leveraging cutting-edge technology and strategic partnerships with organizations, companies, and health institutions.
about.team: This project was developed with passion and dedication by Team 12 at the Hackathon Autism Tech 2024, an event that celebrates creativity and the positive impact of technology on social inclusion.

voiceInput.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support speech recognition.

linksPage.title: Support Resources
linksPage.subtitle: Explore useful resources for people with different types of disabilities.
linksPage.surdosAssociacao: Association of the Deaf of Brazil
linksPage.surdosAssociacaoDescription: An organization providing support and resources for individuals with hearing impairments.
linksPage.centralInterpretesDescription: Interpretation service for hearing-impaired and deaf individuals.
linksPage.brailleLibraryDescription: Access to books in Braille and audio for visually impaired individuals.
linksPage.visualHelpCenterDescription: Support services for people with visual impairments.
linksPage.wheelchairAssociationDescription: Support and resources for wheelchair users.
linksPage.assistiveTechCenterDescription: Services and devices to enhance mobility.
linksPage.apaeDescription: Support for people with intellectual and multiple disabilities.
linksPage.intellectualSupportCenterDescription: Educational resources and support for people with intellectual disabilities.
linksPage.disclaimer: The resources mentioned are provided to assist and support people with disabilities. We are not responsible for services provided by third parties.
